name: Phony Bejeweled Unihornfish
description:
A valuable Ornamental Fish that may be kept as a pet in the Pool of Sapphire Grace and Shaded Clarity.
A peculiar fish species with a single horn. Sturdy and round, it boasts a bouncy belly akin to a balloon.
Some merchants attempted to import specimens of this species from Natlan, putting them on a long-term special feeding regimen that kept the crystalline horn on their heads glassy — a characteristic feature of the species' juvenile stage — before using dyes to grant said protrusion a gem-like luster. Such fish have exceedingly high aesthetic value in ornamental fish hobbyist circles.
However, they could cause serious ecological damage if allowed to reproduce freely in waters where they lack natural predators, and they might not adapt well to being shifted back to Natlan's water bodies. As such, the wondrous Realm Within may prove their most suitable long-term dwelling...
